programme.title: We Need to Talk About Kevin
programme.desc: Eva is mother to the evil Kevin. She contends with her clueless husband and her son's malevolent ways, in this chilling and unforgettable film.

programme.title: Bad Milo
programme.desc: A man learns that his unusual stomach pains are being caused by a demon living in his intestines.

programme.title: Listening
programme.desc: Grad students invent mind-reading technology that destroys their lives and threatens the future of free will itself.

programme.title: Flourish
programme.desc: Gaby Winters babysits a precocious, smart-ass 16-year-old girl. But while Gaby is watching her, the rebellious girl mysteriously vanishes. Needing the defiant girl home before her parents return, Gaby embarks on a wild adventure to find her.

programme.title: Wasteland
programme.desc: Recently released from prison, Harvey Miller reunites with his three best friends to rob and enact revenge on a local drug kingpin.

programme.title: Don't Blink
programme.desc: Ten people arrive at a secluded mountain resort to find it completely deserted. With no gas for the return trip, the visitors are forced to stay and investigate the mystery surrounding the abandoned lodge.

programme.title: Jamie Marks Is Dead
programme.desc: Based on the novel 'One For Sorrow', this is the story of a murdered high school boy who returns as a ghost looking for the love and friendship he never had when he was alive.

programme.title: Siren
programme.desc: Leigh has a unique power: every man who encounters her sees his ultimate fantasy, and falls uncontrollably in love with her.

programme.title: Nina of the Woods
programme.desc: Aspiring actress, Nina Noon, agrees to lend her "local authenticity" to a supernatural reality show where she and the cynical documentary crew follow an enigmatic wilderness guide on an unexplainable adventure into Mother Nature's Abyss.

programme.title: Freaks
programme.desc: Kept locked inside the house by her father, 7-year-old Chloe lives in fear and fascination of the outside world, where Abnormals create a constant threat – or so she believes. When a mysterious stranger offers her a glimpse of what’s really happening outside, Chloe soon finds that while the truth isn’t so simple, the danger is very real.

programme.title: Meek's Cutoff
programme.desc: Settlers traveling through the Oregon desert in 1845 find themselves stranded in harsh conditions.

programme.title: We Have Always Lived in the Castle
programme.desc: Two sisters live in isolation with their deranged uncle following the deaths of the rest of their family. When a cousin comes to visit, family secrets and scandals unravel. Based on the beloved Shirley Jackson novel.

programme.title: The Lodgers
programme.desc: A sinister presence haunts twins to endlessly repeat a long-held family curse as punishment for their ancestors’ sins. When a twin finds love, she rebels against the doctrine, urging the other to stop a horrid legacy.
